reviews.review_text: Kevin did such an amazing job! He really knows his stuff as he had an answer for all my questions. He is very professional and very easy to get along with and also he comes to your residence and is set up within 10 minutes. No more trying to make 5000 hairs look like 100,000 lol. Thanks again Kevin

I cannot thank Kevin enough! He has changed my life! Such a great person to deal with. I sincerely appreciate your patience and professionalism. He explained everything in detail and was better then any clinic and Dr I have ever been to! I cannot recommend Kevin enough.

Kevin was Extremely Professional and Meticulous. He gentle and calm demeanour was very helpful. He was able to put my fears at ease. Highly Recommend. I only get compliments, people comment on how good my hair cut looks! Such a great job. Thank you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Zaki. Yes when you get SMP done right its natural and undetectable.  Im glad your hair is nice and fuller now

reviews.review_text: We recently had SMP done by Kevin for myself and my father. We were really pleased with the procedure. It looks great. We highly recommend him. His rates are reasonable.

I decided to try smp after years of trying to cover up my hair line comb over kind of thing .. I shaved my hair short before my appointment.. Kevin came to my house  did one session it looked way better 3 weeks later did a second session now it looks like I just buzzed my hair Looks amazing Kevin is a very nice guy easy to talk to.. Was the Best choice I ever made for my thinning hair problem Plus he is at least half the price of other companies in bc doing this Thanks Kevin
I highly recommend Kevin for SMP. His business is mobile, so you don t have to leave the comfort of your own home.
Kevin was so helpful, he was very nice and the in-home service was very convenient.

Great job! Kevin is very professional, pleasant and highly competitively priced. Very friendly and communicates very well. I wish I had found out about him sooner! I feel so young again. I defend recommend to anyone. Thank you again.
i love the way my hair looks now really notice a difference and others comment too kevin really knows what hes talking about alot of experience and super nice and interesting guy

Nowadays it is so important to look good to feel good, as when you are confident inside it shows to the outside world. Thanks to the micro-pigmentation that Kevin made for my friend, he is super happy! Highly recommend it and the most convenient you can get it done from the comfort of your home. Thank you Kevin for helping many people every single day
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Azara, Tell your friend Moes it was a pleasure working on his scalp. I know he doesnt speak English but those kebabs he made were amazing. Also thanks to you for translating our convos to him.

reviews.review_text: My hair is much fuller after Kevin did smp on it. I highly recommend him.

I have contacted many of them for doing this, but no one explained and communicated with me like Kevin did. He did a great job on my scalp and I am really satisfied in his work. I can confidently recommend kevin to anyone.
Kevin is very professional, knowledgeable, and is an expert in his field. I would highly recommend Kevin

I m so thankful that I found out about SMP. Kevin was great throughout the process and explained everything in detail in order for a better understanding. He made everything as comfortable and efficient as possible. He was very informative and professional. If you are struggling with hair thinning and want more fullness/density he will listen and address any concerns in order to come up with a perfect solution to satisfy your wants/needs.
Kevin is very professional, knowledgeable, and is an expert in his field. I would recommend reaching out to him if you would like to get SMP treatment. He is mobile and will come to you!
This place is incredible, they know what they are doing, they have extremely great knowledge about their profession. Highly recommended place.
incredible work done by the staff member. great job. very professional.
Glad to connect with The Bald Cure, really appreciate the service! What other artist will come right to your home?
I had my scalp done by Kevin. He did a awesome job.
Kevin made my hair fuller and has The best prices and his experience level in amazing.

I just finished my first session.  I am blown away.  I haven t even healed yet and it looks amazing.  You can t help but focus on the bad pictures you see online when you google SMP, so you are always a bit hesitant.  Not with Kevin.  I am a pale blond haired white guy and I was worried that it wouldn t look natural but I can t stop looking in the mirror.  I really can t believe how natural it looks.  It blends perfectly with my sides and the front doesn t look to sharp.  My expectations of the final result were completely blown away.  I would give 10 stars if I could.  Thanks bro!
I was referred to Kevin by a few friends of mine. His work is the most realistic smp out there. You will be glad you chose him
Kevin is awesome, very professional and easy to get along with. He does a great job for a reasonable quote
Kevin was  the best. Very honest and his skills were excellent. I highly recommend him

Love my new look! Kevin is very professional, pleasant and highly competitively priced. Very friendly and communicates very well. I wish I had found out about him sooner! The only drawback I can say is that he books up very fast, as he is one of the best bar none.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Bro. Im glad your happy. Yes Im currently booked Into late November at the moment. Its July 20th 2021 as Im writing this. So many refferals. Im blessed and greatly appreciate all of my customers who are now my friends and sending me so much business. Thanks from the bottom of my heart :)

reviews.review_text: Really satisfied with their work! I had lots of doubts regarding the procedure, but Kevin explained me everything very well and they did a great job. One of the best customer service.
I was referred to kevin for SMP. Im glad i found him.

My husband got micropigmentation here, he s always had such thin hair, now it looks so much fuller. Service was great, Kevin was kind and talked us through the steps, and patiently answered all of our questions. Def recommended!
Kevin did a great job on my scalp. Highly recommend.

Kevin was a great dude. Super nice super informative! His prices are by far the best across Canada. You cannot beat his skills and professionalism! Will definitely recommend whoever I can to Kevin. Thanks again man! See you for session 3!
Kevin did a excellent job, he was very friendly and great prices. I would recommend his services!
highly professional staff. Must visit them if you looking to get hair transplan

Kevin is the ultimate professional. His work speaks for himself. There is no other SMP artist on the west coast that can come even close to his generous pricing combined with his perfectionist-like focus and attention to detail. I was beyond ecstatic after seeing the results of my first session. I will see him again in 10 days for session number 2. I will be a lifelong customer of Kevin s, and I look forward to our sessions in the future.

I have had the incredible honor of being a client to such a talented SMP tattoo artist. The two sessions I had were detailed , quick and painless. The best prices Ive seen online thus far! Best money ever spent and shortly will be rocking hat free head !

Kevin is absolutely amazing and very skilled at what he does! I m am so happy with my results and wish I would have done this sooner. If your thinking about getting this procedure done  I 100% recommend Kevin, you will not be disappointed.
I had my smp done by kevin a few years ago. The results are still vibrant and natural. His pricing was very fair. Hes very honest and friendly.

Amazing customer service! The booking process was 10/10 easy and aftercare communication was on point. The service was painless and aesthetically perfect! I have highly recommended this service to my friends and to everyone reading reviews on here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Caty. Im glad your happy  .

reviews.review_text: Kevin came to my house and set up his stuff pretty quick, the procedure was a breeze, love my results

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your Kind words. Im glad your happy  .

reviews.review_text: Kevin is a wonderful guy great at what he does.

Had a good experience. Kevin was very honest. My head was going thin. After previewing a few clinics. I was surprised with Kevins pricing. He had way more experience than the other clinics, that were charging 3 times more. I completed 3 sessions and will send my whole family to you Kevin   much love. Rest your wrists.
Kevin did a great job on my hair density
He is really amazing & skilled, very professional too. I had hair thinning issue and he came for my rescue. Im so happy with the result.

Had 2 sessions of SMP done with Kevin and I cannot stress how happy I am with the results. Kevin is a true professional and just a very genuine, kind and down to earth person. I would highly recommend Kevin to anyone whos considering getting the SMP done and that they do not need to consider another choice. Thank you Kevin for the great work and giving me my confidence back.

So I dont ever take the time to write reviews but honestly I felt I have to not only did kevin do a fantastic job on my hair tattoo looks amazing he also got me in on short notice he came on his day off  he is super fast at what hes dose he is really chill cool guy I would and will recommend him to anyone looking to have this done ..by as far as I am concerned the best in the field and best rate.. needless to say my whole experience was awesome and I truly could not be happier thank you kevin harper you da man!!  because of you I will be going to my Lil Bros wedding with confidence again thanks bro!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Dave, it was a pleasure working on your scalp.

reviews.review_text: Thanks Kevin for giving me back my hairline. Very professional and honest., definitely going recommend to my brother and friends. Appointment is not rushed you can tell you care about your customers results, another benefit is that it s done in the comfort of your home, again Thank you I couldn t be more pleased with the results. Anyone reading reviews to decide who to call look no further.

reviews.review_text: Kevin is a great guy and very skilled at his work. He was very affordable and friendly. My hair looks perfect.
Just had my smp done yesterday and can say i am extremely happy with the results.  Kevin did a great job. 10/10 would recommend if you are considering smp!
Kevin did an amazing job on my head I don t feel bold anymore I feel young and he was very positive and calm with me and patient
Kevin is a sincere, easy-going guy, yet really dedicated to providing excellent service. You can be sure he will give you the best hes got - thats why hes so in demand!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Pat. It was a pleasure working on your scalp. :)

reviews.review_text: I found Kevin very professional to deal with and the results were great! I had this procedure done by someone else before but they used a semi-permanent ink that faded over a short period of time. The ink that Kevin uses is better quality and doesn t fade so I m very happy. Would definitely recommend his services to others.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Taz. The lady who worked on your scalp before was a beginner. SMP is like getting your Drivers license. You first get your L (learners license) then you need at least 20 clients before you can get your N (Novice license) then after that 80 clients before you get your class 5 graduated license. Im at 230 clients to date (as of april 27th 2020) :) I can take on any case as Ive developed the skills, experience, and knowledge of every skin type out there.

reviews.review_text: Im very glad to have been referred to Kevin. I had two sessions and am happy with the results. I wanted it soft and natural. Which kevin asked me to show him photos of the type of SMP I wanted.  He then chose the appropriate shade. Hes very friendly and listens to your requests. Highly recommend him.
Kevin is such a great guy. Very caring and skilled at what he does.
Great job done by kevin

Had a great experience with SMP. He arrived on time and was very friendly. I appreciated the ability to do at home visits. He allowed me a lot of say in how I wanted the overall look to be. It took a few sessions to get the exact look but I am overall very please with the process. Would highly recommend!

I just finished my training program with Kevin. I learned so much. I highly recommend him for one on one training especially if you are a complete newbie. The things I learnt as a apprentice are so valuable. Thanks again Kevin for all your help. Ill be starting my smp business in Calgary soon and will be sure to show you my work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ashley. Im always here if you ever need advice. :)

reviews.review_text: Kevin did a great job! Definitely recommend anyone looking to do an SMP to go to him.
Awesome job by Kevin. He did a very natural hairline and it looks really good.

Couldn t say enough good things, always on time super friendly great to be around really precise on what he does helps you through any questions and ideas to go forward  I would definitely contact him even if you just have some questions very nice to deal with  extremely happy with the results totally changed my look
